lead_paragraph: Two referees and one linesman have been suspended for three months and publicly criticised by African soccer's governing body while another has been warned, following their performances in recent World Cup qualifiers.

headline.print_headline: Refs Banned, Publicly Criticised After World Cup Qualifiers
headline.main: Refs Banned, Publicly Criticised After World Cup Qualifiers

snippet: Two referees and one linesman have been suspended for three months and publicly criticised by African soccer's governing body while another has been warned, following their performances in recent World Cup qualifiers....
